SA11n1103:655: tataśca pūrvakṛtapāpasya vidūṣaṇāsamudācārādinā parikṣayaṃ śikṣāsaṃvaraparirakṣaṇena bodhicittasevanādinā ca kuśalapakṣasya ca vṛddhiṃ kuryām | yaduktam-
SA11n1103:658: ato lābhāntarāyakāriṇi yukta eva pradveṣa ityāśaṅkayannāha-
SA11n1103:659: pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca lābhājjīvan karomi cet |
SA11n1103:660: lābhāduktakrameṇa jīvan dhriyamāṇaḥ pāpakṣayaṃ ca puṇyaṃ ca karomītyādi manyase |
SA11n1103:661: nanu etaditaḥ samadhikaṃ doṣamapaśyatā abhidhīyata ityāha-
SA11n1103:662: puṇyakṣayaśca pāpaṃ ca lābhārthaṃ krudhyato nanu ||60 ||
SA11n1103:663: lābhārthaṃ lābhanimittaṃ tadantarāyakāriṇi dveṣaṃ kurvataḥ sukṛtakṣaya evopajāyate |
SA11n1103:673: tadā kiṃ tena tādṛśena jīvitenāpi kevalāśubhakarmakaraṇaśīlena ?
SA11n1103:697: parāśritāprasādattvādaprasādiṣu aprasannacitteṣu avarṇavādiṣu tava kṣamā kṣāntirūtpadyate |
SA11n1103:700: yadi yaḥ parāyattāprasādaḥ tatra kṣamā bhavato bhavati,
SA11n1103:707: na yujyate mama dveṣo buddhādīnāṃ na hi vyathā ||64 ||
SA11n1103:711: kutaḥ ? yasmādbuddhādīnāṃ bodhisattvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ vitathābhiniveśaprasūtātmagrāhanivṛtterabhiṣvaṅgābhāvānna vyathā cittapīḍālakṣaṇaṃ daurmanasyaṃ nāsti |
SA11n1103:714: tathā viruddhadharmakāriṣu karuṇaiva tu yujyate teṣu sādhūnām |
SA11n1103:726: tathā priyāṇāṃ premasthānānāṃ cāpakāriṣu kopaṃ nivārayediti saṃbandhaḥ |
SA11n1103:731: tadanena yathā aparasamaye devagurudvijātimātāpitṛprabhṛtīnāmarthe pāpaṃ kurvato'pi na doṣa iti matam,
SA11n1103:733: kiṃ ca | idamapi vastutattvaṃ manasi kurvatā na sattveṣu cittaṃ dūṣayitavyamityāha-
SA11n1103:735: sā vyathā cetane dṛṣṭā kṣamasvaināṃ vyathāmataḥ ||66 ||
SA11n1103:737: sā ca sāmagrī vastudharmatayā kācit kvacit samarthasvabhāvā |
SA11n1103:742: svayameva yadṛcchayā vā loṣṭakuḍyādyabhighātajanitā vā dehināṃ śarīriṇāṃ niyatā vyathā niyamena samutpadyate |
SA11n1103:744: sā caivaṃ dvividhakāraṇasāmagrīprasūtāpi cetane savijñānake kāye dṛṣṭā pramāṇapariniścitā |
SA11n1103:748: tato yad yasyotpattisthānaṃ tat tatraiva bhavati nānyatra,
SA11n1103:750: ataḥ asmānyāyāt kṣamasva sahasva enāmanantarakathitobhayarūpāṃ vyathām ||
SA11n1103:751: tadānīmubhayorapi sādhāraṇadūṣaṇatayā kvacidapi kopo na yukta iti kathayitumāha-
SA11n1103:753: brūmaḥ kameṣu nirdoṣaṃ kaṃ vā brūmo'parādhinam ||67 ||
SA11n1103:762: idamapi ca ātmagatameva cintayatā pratighacittaṃ nivartayitavyamityāha-
SA11n1103:763: kasmādevaṃ kṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ yenaivaṃ bādhyase paraiḥ |
SA11n1103:772: sarve duḥkhahetavaḥ karmapratyayopajanitapravṛttayaḥ iti ko'hamatra anyathākṛtau tatphalanivartanāya ? na kaścit |
SA11n1103:775: evaṃ buddhvā tu puṇyeṣu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham |
SA11n1103:777: ete sattvāḥ karmakleśaparāyattāḥ parasparamasamañjasakarmakāriṇo nivartayitumaśakyā iti |
SA11n1103:778: evaṃ buddhvā jñātvā punaḥ puṇyeṣu kuśaleṣu karmasu tathā yatnaṃ karomyaham,
SA11n1103:780: yena tathāvidhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ pratilabhya sanmārge pravartitāḥ santaḥ sarve maitracittā hitasukhavidhānatatparāḥ parasparamanyonyaṃ bhaviṣyanti ||
SA11n1103:781: drohacittaṃ vinivartya priyavastūpaghātakāriṇi laukikodāharaṇena dveṣaṃ nivartayediti ślokadvayamupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1103:786: ekasmin gṛhe'gninā dahyamāne yathā tasmād gṛhādanyad gṛhaṃ gṛhāntaraṃ gatvā |
SA11n1103:788: tadantargatamanyadapi vastu mā dhākṣīditi śaṅkayā tadākṛṣyāpanīyate,
SA11n1103:791: evamuktodāharaṇanyāyena cittaṃ mano yasya vastuna āsaṅgādāsakto dahyate paritapyate dveṣavahninā pratighānalena tadāsaṅgasthānaṃ vastu tatkṣaṇaṃ na kālāntarapalimbena parityājyaṃ tatrābhiniveśaḥ parihartavyaḥ |
SA11n1103:795: tasya uktakrameṇa uddāhaḥ parikṣayo mā bhūt |
SA11n1103:804: pratyuta labdhalābhamātmānaṃ manyate atyalpamidaṃ maraṇaduḥkhāt karacchedanaduḥkhamiti |
SA11n1103:805: tathā yo'pi manuṣyaduḥkhaṃ tāḍanabandhanatiraskārādikṛtamanubhūya narakaduḥkhādvimukto bhavati,
SA11n1103:811: athāpi syāt-na mayā svalpamātre'pi duḥkhe kṣamā kartuṃ śakyata iti, atrāha-
SA11n1103:814: khaṭacapeṭaloṣṭādiprahārakṛtamīṣanmātramapi duḥkhamidānīṃ soḍhuṃ marṣituṃ na pāryate na śakyate |
SA11n1103:816: tadayaṃ nārakaduḥkhasaṃvartanīyaḥ krodhaḥ kopaḥ kasmātkāraṇānna vāryate ?
SA11n1103:817: ayameva hi atitarāṃ narakeṣu duḥkhadāyaka iti duḥkhabhīrūṇāmeva krodhaṃ nivartayituṃ yuktaṃ syāt ||
SA11n1103:818: kiṃ ca | yadyapi soḍhuṃ na śakyate,
SA11n1103:821: marṣaṇāt punastasya mahārthalābho bhaviṣyatīti vṛttadvayena śikṣayitumāha-
SA11n1103:823: kārito'smi na cātmārthaḥ parārtho vā kṛto mayā ||74 ||
SA11n1103:824: na cedaṃ tādṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ mahārthaṃ ca kariṣyati |
SA11n1103:831: evaṃ duḥkhamanubhavatāpi mayā na ca naiva ātmārthaḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭaphalasādhanaḥ kṛto niṣpāditaḥ |
SA11n1103:834: tadadyāpi na tathaiva mamāsahiṣṇutā yuktetyāha-idaṃ duḥkhaṃ naiva tādṛśaṃ yādṛśaṃ narakasamudbhavam |
SA11n1103:835: atha ca mahārthaṃ sarvasattvahitasukhavidhānabhūtaṃ buddhatvaṃ sādhayiṣyati |
SA11n1103:836: ato jagato duḥkhahare trijagatparyāpannasarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanakare duḥkhe prītirevātra yujyate nāruciriti bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1103:839: manastvamapi taṃ stutvā kasmādevaṃ na hṛṣyasi ||76 ||
SA11n1103:840: guṇādhikaṃ stutvā yadi prītisukhaṃ kaiścit prāptam,
SA11n1103:841: tadā he manaḥ tvamapi tadguṇasaṃvarṇanena kimiti harṣasukhaṃ nānubhavasi ?
SA11n1103:846: yatra yatra ratiṃ yāti manaḥ sukhavimohitam |
SA11n1103:850: idaṃ ca te hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ sukhodayam |
SA11n1103:854: idaṃ ca paraguṇāśrayaṃ hṛṣṭisukhaṃ niravadyaṃ tava,
SA11n1103:857: ata eva na vāritaṃ ca guṇibhirbhagavacchāsanavidhijñaiḥ |
SA11n1103:860: guṇeṣu evamayaṃ matsarīti manyamānā anye'pi sattvā āvarjitā bhavanti,
SA11n1103:863: kiṃ tarhi tāvattasyaiva sukhametaditi mayā soḍhumaśakyamiti | atrāha-
SA11n1103:864: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam |
SA11n1103:866: tasyaiva stutikartuḥ sukhamiti evamanenābhiprāyeṇa bhavato yadi idaṃ paraguṇastutipratisamudbhavaṃ sukhaṃ na priyam,
SA11n1103:869: yadapi ca bhavataḥ svātmasukhanimittaṃ svabhṛtyādiṣu bhṛtidānaṃ karmamūlyadānam,
SA11n1103:877: kiṃ ca | mithyottaramevedaṃ bhavata iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11n1103:888: tasyaiva sukhamityevaṃ tavedaṃ yadi na priyam | iti |
SA11n1103:895: yataḥ sarvasattvāḥ triadhātukāntaścarāḥ samastasukhasaṃpattisaṃtarpitā buddhatvamadhigamya mayā kartavyāḥ iti manasikāreṇa bodhicittamutpādyate |
SA11n1103:900: iti akaraṇīyameva tat parasukhavaimukhyacittaṃ bodhisattvasyeti bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1103:901: yaḥ punarutpāditabodhicitto'pi parasya lābhasatkārasaṃpattimabhisamīkṣya tadīrṣyākaṣāyitahṛdayaḥ tenaiva śokena dahyate,
SA11n1103:905: athavā syādetat-na khalu mayā tatsukhameva na mṛṣyate,
SA11n1103:907: trayo lokāeva kāmarūpārūpyadhātulakṣaṇāḥ lokaprasiddhayā vā svargādisvabhāvāḥ trailokyam,
SA11n1103:917: puṣṇāti yastvayā poṣyaṃ tubhyameva dadāti saḥ |
SA11n1103:919: tvayā poṣaṇīyaṃ priyaputrakādikaṃ tvadīyaṃ yaḥ puṣṇāti,
SA11n1103:922: ataḥ tvatkuṭumbajīvinaṃ tvadīyaṃ kuṭumbaṃ jīvayati yaḥ,
SA11n1103:923: taṃ tathāvidhaṃ puruṣaṃ labdhvā prāpya prahṛṣyasi na ?
SA11n1103:926: tathā prakṛte'pi yena sarvasattvā ātmīyatvena gṛhītāḥ,
SA11n1103:930: sa kiṃ necchasi sattvānāṃ yasteṣāṃ bodhimicchati |
SA11n1103:936: tathāpi yaḥ samutpāditabodhicittaḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhiṃ buddhatvamicchati,
SA11n1103:946: api ca | aparasya lābhasatkārasaṃpadabhāve'pi na bhavatastadbhāvasaṃbhavaḥ |
SA11n1103:947: tatkimakāraṇameva tadvidveṣiṇā ātmaghātāya yatnaḥ kriyate iti pratipādayannāha-
SA11n1103:948: yadi tena na tallabdhaṃ sthitaṃ dānapatergṛhe |
SA11n1103:949: sarvathāpi na tatte'sti dattādattena tena kim ||84 ||
SA11n1103:950: yadi nāma tena tava akṣamāviṣayeṇa sattvena taddīyamānaṃ vastu na labdham,
SA11n1103:953: sarvathāpi tena labdhena gṛhāvasthitena vā na tadvastu tavāsti |
SA11n1103:959: labhamāno na gṛhṇātu vada kena na kupyasi ||85 ||
SA11n1103:961: sa kiṃ vārayatu puṇyāni pūrvajanmakṛtāni vipākonmukhāni,
SA11n1103:969: brūhi kena prakāreṇa atra na bhavato'paritoṣaḥ syāt |
SA11n1103:970: tatra puṇyādīnāṃ vārayitumaśakyatvāt labhyamānāgrahaṇe'pi sarvathāpi na tatte'stītyādinā bādhakasyoktatvāditi na kiṃcit paritoṣakāraṇamasti ||
SA11n1103:975: na kevalaṃ tvamātmānaṃ kṛtapāpaṃ na śocasi |
SA11n1103:984: yat kiṃcit sukhaṃ tat sarvaṃ puṇyaprasūtam |
SA11n1103:985: iti sukhābhilāṣiṇā śubhe karmaṇi udyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
SA11n1103:989: iti kathaṃ kṛtapuṇyaiḥ saha spardhā yujyate ?
SA11n1103:993: tava śatrordveṣaviṣayasya tvadabhilāṣamātreṇa apriyamaniṣṭaṃ jātamutpannaṃ ced yadi,
SA11n1103:1005: atha tvadicchayā siddhaṃ tadduḥkhe kiṃ sukhaṃ tava |
SA11n1103:1006: yadi nāma tavecchayā siddhaṃ niṣpannamapriyaṃ śatroḥ,
SA11n1103:1007: tathāpi tasya duḥkhe samutpanne kiṃ sukhaṃ tava ? na kiṃcit |
SA11n1103:1009: nanu idameva prayojanaṃ yat tadduḥkhe mama saṃtuṣṭirityata āha-
SA11n1103:1011: evamapi paraduḥkhaparitoṣe yadi arthaḥ prayojanaṃ bhavet,
SA11n1103:1012: tadā ataḥ paraḥ anarthaḥ ko nu ?
SA11n1103:1020: kleśā eva baḍiśena carantīti bāḍiśikāḥ tairarpitamādattam |
SA11n1103:1023: narakapālā yamapuruṣāḥ tvāṃ krītvā pakṣyanti pakṣyante |
SA11n1103:1029: stutiryaśo'tha satkāro na puṇyāya na cāyuṣe |
SA11n1103:1030: na balārthaṃ na cārogye na ca kāyasukhāya me ||90 ||
SA11n1103:1039: iyāneva hi svārtho bhavato bhavet prajñāvataḥ svārthavedinaḥ |
SA11n1103:1049: tadicchatā madyaṃ dyūtaṃ gaṇikā pāradārikaṃ sevanīyaṃ syāt |
SA11n1103:1052: tasmāt saumanasya heturbhavato'pi stutyādayo bālajanānandakāriṇo'nupādeyā eva ||
SA11n1103:1055: kecinmohapuruṣāḥ tādṛśaguṇāt svayamatisudūre vartamānā api śakrādiguṇaiḥ stūyamānā bandijanairanyaiśca protphullanayanavadanā yaśorthino hastyaśvādidhanaṃ tṛṇavat tebhyaḥ prayacchanti |
SA11n1103:1056: tathā taireva guṇaiḥ saṃbhāvitātmanāmapi śakravat śatruvijayasamudbhūtaṃ yaśo mama jagati vipulatāṃ gamiṣyati,
SA11n1103:1060: kimakṣarāṇi bhakṣyāṇi mṛte kasya ca tatsukham ||92 ||
SA11n1103:1061: stutyādyabhidhāyakāni akṣarāṇi varṇāḥ kiṃ bhakṣyāṇi carvitavyāni ?
SA11n1103:1062: yaśorthaṃ mṛte sati kasya ca tat sukhaṃ yaśaḥśravaṇasamuttham ?
SA11n1103:1065: yathā kaścid bālo dhūlimayagṛheṇa paramaparitoṣeṇa parikrīḍamānaḥ kenacit tasmin bhagne mahadduḥkhena parigṛhītaḥ paramārtipīḍita iva madgṛhaṃ bhagnamiti karuṇasvaraṃ krandati,
SA11n1103:1068: tathaiva stutiyaśohānau vighāte svacittaṃ duḥkhamāviśat pratibhāsate vicārayato mama |
SA11n1103:1069: atrāpi na vastusatā kenacid vipralambha iti parāmarṣṭavyam ||
SA11n1103:1070: punaranyathā vicāreṇa bāladharma evāyamiti caturbhiḥ ślokaiḥ parāmṛśayannāha-
SA11n1103:1074: sa śabdo māṃ stauti madīyaṃ varṇamudīrayati |
SA11n1103:1085: anyatra mayi vā prītyā kiṃ hi me parakīyayā |
SA11n1103:1086: tasyaiva tatprītisukhaṃ bhāgo nālpo'pi me tataḥ ||95 ||
SA11n1103:1087: yasmādanyasmin mayi vā prītyā parasaṃtānavartinyā kimāyātaṃ mama ? na kiṃcit |
SA11n1103:1088: kutaḥ ? tasyaiva tato ya eva prītaḥ stutikartā,
SA11n1103:1090: ato bhāgo nālpo'pi īṣadapi mama tataḥ parasaṃtānavartinaḥ prītisukhāt ||
SA11n1103:1092: tat kimiti tato bhāgo nāstīti ? atrāha-
SA11n1103:1096: tadā tasminnanyatra prasādena sukhite'pi mamāstu tatsukhitvam |
SA11n1103:1098: na tvanyasmin prasādena sukhiteṣu mama sukham ||
SA11n1103:1103: tadanyanimittābhāvāt ahaṃ stuta ityevaṃ vikalpanāt prītirātmabni jāyate,
SA11n1103:1106: ātmanyapi evamuktakrameṇa asaṃbandhādapratyāsatteḥ kāraṇāt kevalaṃ bālavilasitametat ||
SA11n1103:1107: api ca | stutyādayo mama apacayameva dadhatītyupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1103:1109: guṇavatsu ca mātsaryaṃ saṃpatkopaṃ ca kurvate ||98 ||
SA11n1103:1117: tadguṇāsahanatayā vā saṃpadi lābhasatkārādisvabhāvāyāṃ kopaṃ ca amarṣaṃ kurvate teṣveva |
SA11n1103:1124: stutyādighātāya virodhāya ye sattvā mama pratyupasthitā udyatāḥ |
SA11n1103:1126: tato rakṣārthaṃ trāṇārthaṃ rakṣaṇanimittaṃ pravṛttā udyuktā nanu te mama |
SA11n1103:1131: ye mocayanti māṃ bandhādveṣasteṣu kathaṃ mama ||100 ||
SA11n1103:1135: kalyāṇamitrakṛtyakāriṇaḥ śatrutvenābhimatā vimocayanti viyojayanti māṃ bandhāt saṃsāraduḥkhalakṣaṇāt lābhādisvabhāvādvā |
SA11n1103:1147: kuśalavighātaḥ kṛto'nena ityevaṃ manasi nidhāya atra puṇyavighātakāriṇi dveṣo na yujyate |
SA11n1103:1148: kasmāt ? yataḥ kṣāntyā titikṣayā samaṃ tulyaṃ tapaḥ sukṛtaṃ nāsti sarvaśubhakarmahetutvāt |
SA11n1103:1153: tatra pradveṣe tu ātmanaiva puṇyavighātaḥ kṛto bhavedityāha-
SA11n1103:1156: atha yadi ātmana eva doṣeṇa asahiṣṇutātmakena na karomi kṣamāṃ kṣāntimiha vighnakāriṇi,
SA11n1103:1157: tadā mayaiva na punaranyena atra puṇye kṛto vighnaḥ |
SA11n1103:1163: yo hi yena vinā nāsti yasmiṃśca sati vidyate |
SA11n1103:1164: sa eva kāraṇaṃ tasya sa kathaṃ vighna ucyate ||104 ||
SA11n1103:1165: yo bhāvaḥ kāryābhimataḥ yena kāraṇābhimatena vinā nāsti,
SA11n1103:1170: evaṃ prakṛte'pi sa janaka eva kathaṃ tasya janyasya vighna ucyate vighātaheturabhidhīyate ?
SA11n1103:1171: tathāvidhe'pi tathā vyavahāraṃ kurvato nāsti vipratipattiḥ ||
SA11n1103:1174: na ca pravrājake prāpte pravrajyāvighna ucyate ||105 ||
SA11n1103:1175: na yasmāt kasyaciddānapaterditsākāle eva saṃprāptenārthinā yācanakena dānavighnaḥ kṛtaḥ ityucyate,
SA11n1103:1177: tathā kasyacit pravrajitukāmasya pravrājakasamavadhānaṃ pravrajyā saṃvarādigrahaṇasvabhāvā,
SA11n1103:1182: api ca | kṣāntiheturatidurlabha iti tatsamāgame prītireva yujyate ityupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1103:1184: atipracuraprāptikā yācanakā loke sarvatra sarveṣāṃ dīyamānagrahaṇāvaimukhyāt,
SA11n1103:1187: yadi kathaṃcit kaścit syādvā na veti |
SA11n1103:1190: yasmādanaparādhasya nivṛttaparāpakārasya mama nirnimittaṃ na kaścideko'pi aparādhyati,
SA11n1103:1197: tasmād gṛhe prādurbhūto nidhiriva śramamantareṇaivādhigato ripurabhilaṣaṇīya eva mayā syāt,
SA11n1103:1199: evaṃvidhe paramapuruṣārthe sāhāyyaṃ bhajamānasya pratyupakārakaraṇameva kṛtajñatayā mama yuktamityupadarśayannāha-
SA11n1103:1202: yasmādasau tatra sāhāyyaṃ kurvan kāraṇameva na vighnaḥ tasmānmayā kṣamāmabhyastatā,
SA11n1103:1206: kṣamāphalaṃ dharmādhigamalakṣaṇam etasmai dharmasahāyāya prathamamagrato dātavyaṃ mayā iti praṇidhātavyam |
SA11n1103:1209: eṣa eva pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathoktā |
SA11n1103:1213: kṣamāsiddhayāśayo nāsya tena pūjyo na cedariḥ |
SA11n1103:1217: tena kāraṇena kuśalaheturapi yadi śatruḥ pūjanīyo na bhavati,
SA11n1103:1218: evaṃ tarhi kuśalaniṣpattihetuḥ nirabhiprāyo'pi saddharmaḥ pravacanalakṣaṇaḥ kathaṃ pūjyate ?
SA11n1103:1219: so'pi tadāśayaśūnyatvāt pūjanīyo na syāt, iti bhāvaḥ ||
SA11n1103:1225: ityevamabhisaṃdhāya śatruryadi na pūjyate dānamānairna satkriyate |
SA11n1103:1226: anyatheti apakāriṇi dveṣacittamanivārayataḥ kathaṃ mama kṣāntiḥ ?
SA11n1103:1227: tadapakāramasahamānasya pratyapakāraṃ vā kurvato naiva yuktetyarthaḥ |
SA11n1103:1238: ataḥ asmāddhetoḥ tasya duṣṭāśayameva pratītya nimittīkṛtya samupajāyate kṣamā |
SA11n1103:1240: ataḥ asmāt sa eva yasyāśayaṃ pratītyotpadyate kṣamā kṣamāhetuḥ,
SA11n1103:1258: kutaḥ ? yato yasmādetān sattvān jināṃśca ārādhya ānukūlyānuṣṭhānena bahavo buddhatvamadhigamya sarvalaukikalokottarasarvasaṃpattiparyantaṃ prāptāḥ ||
SA11n1103:1260: tathāpi tathāgataiḥ saha sādhāraṇatā na yukteti | atrāha-
SA11n1103:1262: jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvanna sattveṣviti kaḥ kramaḥ ||113 ||
SA11n1103:1263: ubhayebhyo'pi buddhadharmāṇāṃ balavaiśāradyādīnāmāgame pratilambhe tulye aviśiṣṭe |
SA11n1103:1265: ataḥ sādhāraṇe'pi hetubhāve jineṣu gauravaṃ yadvat,
SA11n1103:1269: nanu ca sattvānāṃ rāgādimalairhīnāśayatvāt kāraṇatve'pi kathaṃ bhagavatsamānatā yujyate ityāśaṅkayāha-
SA11n1103:1270: āśayasya ca māhātmyaṃ na svataḥ kiṃ tu kāryataḥ |
SA11n1103:1271: samaṃ ca tena māhātmyaṃ sattvānāṃ tena te samāḥ ||114 ||
SA11n1103:1273: tathāpi upayuktopayogitvena hetubhāvasya tulyatvāt samaṃ māhātmyamucyate |
SA11n1103:1274: tena hetunā te sattvāḥ samāḥ jinaistulyā ucyante iti nātra viśeṣaḥ kriyate ||
SA11n1103:1288: paramārthatastu na buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ samāḥ kecit sattvāḥ santi |
SA11n1103:1301: dṛśyate tasya pūjārthaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam ||117 ||
SA11n1103:1306: tasya tadguṇādhārasya pūjānimittaṃ trailokyamapi na kṣamam |
SA11n1103:1316: aparyantopakāriṇāṃ niṣkṛtiḥ tatkṛtāpakārasya niṣkrayaṇaṃ pariśodhanamiti yāvat |
SA11n1103:1319: prabhucittānukūlavartina eva bhṛtyasya vāñchitaṃ sidhyatītyavagamya sattvārādhanamevopādeyamiti pratipādayannāha-
SA11n1103:1321: yeṣāṃ kṛte tatra kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt |
SA11n1103:1324: karacaraṇaśironayanasvamāṃsāni chittvā chittvā pradattāni yeṣāṃ hitasukhavidhānāya,
SA11n1103:1325: tathā avīcīmapi paraduḥkhaduḥkhino yeṣāṃ kṛte praviśanti tatsamuddharaṇāya |
SA11n1103:1327: tatra teṣu sattveṣu kṛte kṛtaṃ syāt |
SA11n1103:1328: anyathā tu kṛtamapi na kṛtaṃ bhavet |
SA11n1103:1330: yenaivam, tena paramāpakāriṣvapi na cittaṃ dūṣayitavyam |
SA11n1103:1331: kiṃ tu sarvamanekaprakāraṃ kāyavāṅmanobhirvā kalyāṇameva hitasukhameva vidhātavyameteṣu ||
SA11n1103:1337: mama svāmina eva buddhādayaḥ svayameva ātmanaiva |
SA11n1103:1342: tadahaṃ punaḥ teṣāṃ bhṛtyaḥ teṣu sattveṣu prabhuputreṣvatyantapriyeṣu kathaṃ karomi mānam,
SA11n1103:1346: ito'pi ca sattvāpakāraṃ parityajya tadārādhanameva kartavyamityāha-
SA11n1103:1351: yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ priyaputrāṇāmiva pitaro munīndrā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sukhe kāyamanojanmani mudaṃ harṣaṃ yānti,
SA11n1103:1352: yeṣāṃ ca duḥkhe manyuṃ praviśanti aparitoṣamāsādayanti |
SA11n1103:1364: samantāt sarvāvayavānabhivyāpya vahninā prajvalitaśarīrasya yathā pañcakāmaguṇairna saumanasyam,
SA11n1103:1367: tadvat tathaiva sattvānāṃ vyathāyāṃ duḥkhavedanāyāṃ na prīteḥ saumanasyasya upāyo heturasti kṛpātmakānāṃ bhagavatām ||
SA11n1103:1379: yadi pratirūpamācaritaṃ tatra me kṣāntiṃ kurvantu anukampāmupādāya ||
SA11n1103:1385: tathāgatānāmabhipretasaṃpādanāya loke lokaviṣaye sarvātmanā kāyena vācā manasā vā dāsībhāvaṃ svīkaromi |
SA11n1103:1386: te'pi me prasādaṃ kurvanto mastake pādaṃ nidadhatu |
SA11n1103:1388: anena mayi purvāparādhamapāsya jagatāṃ patirbhagavān saṃtuṣṭamānaso bhavatu ||
SA11n1103:1389: bhagavatsu ca gauravakāribhiḥ sattveṣvanādaro na kartavya iti prasādhayannāha-
SA11n1103:1394: sarvatragadharmadhātuprativedhāt sarvasattvasamatāpādanaparātmaparivartanādinā vā ātmīkṛtaṃ svīkṛtaṃ sarvamidaṃ jagat,
SA11n1103:1399: tasmāt sattvarūpeṇa buddhā bhagavanta evaite sattvā dṛśyante |
SA11n1103:1417: sa ca āgāmirājadaṇḍabhayadarśitayā mahājano vacanamātreṇāpi yāvadvikāramupagantumasamarthaḥ |
SA11n1103:1420: yasmānnaiva sa ekākī tasya rājabalaṃ balam |
SA11n1103:1436: na tu punaḥ sattvāprasaktiphalasya rājāparādhaphalena samānatā samastītyāha-
SA11n1103:1442: kiṃbhūtam ? yena duḥkhajātena nārakī vedanā anubhūyate ||
